data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to obtain information about intercurrent events (category 1, 2 or 3) whenever they occurred during the DCCT. They include description of time, location, type (e.g. ocular, cardiovascular, accidents) and treatment (location, general type, duration) of intercurrent event (see chapter 10 of MOOP).

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: BOCOMDAT
variable.description: Date form for intercurrent event was completed

variable.name: BOLEARN
variable.description: Date clinic learned of intercurrent event

variable.name: BOD7ADAT
variable.description: Date of admission/start of treatment

variable.name: BOD7BDAT
variable.description: Date of discharge or conclusion

variable.name: BOE2BDAT
variable.description: Date diabetes treatment altered

variable.name: BOE2CDAT
variable.description: Date of return to protocol-required treatment

variable.name: DUPOK
variable.description: NOTE: DCC reports that this variable was used for internal data management and should be ignored by analysts.

variable.name: BOCEE1
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: birth weight (grams)

variable.name: BOCEE2
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: gestational age

variable.name: BOCEE3
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: Apgar score

variable.name: BORANDOM
variable.description: Has the patient been randomized

variable.name: BOOCCUR
variable.description: Date of intercurrent event uncertain - Please note: Data entries other than '1' are likely to represent error values.

variable.name: BOHOWLRN
variable.description: How did clinic learn of intercurrent event
variable.value: PATIENT INFORMS CLINIC AT FOLLOW-UP VISIT

variable.name: BOCA
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: ketoacidosis

variable.name: BOCB
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: hyperglycemic, hyperosmolar, non-ketotic coma

variable.name: BOCC
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: definite catastrophic hypoglycemia

variable.name: BOCD
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: suspected catastrophic hypoglycemia

variable.name: BOCE
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: definite severe hypoglycemia

variable.name: BOCF
variable.description: Diabetic intercurrent event: suspected severe hypoglycemia

variable.name: BOCG
variable.description: Ocular intercurrent event: loss of vision

variable.name: BOCH
variable.description: Ocular intercurrent event: high risk characteristics (HRC)

variable.name: BOCI
variable.description: Ocular intercurrent event: ocular disease - other than retinopathy

variable.name: BOCJ
variable.description: Ocular intercurrent event: photocoagulation

variable.name: BOCK
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: definite acute myocardial infarct

variable.name: BOCL
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: suspected acute myocardial infarct

variable.name: BOCM
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: angina pectoris

variable.name: BOCN
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: arrhythmia

variable.name: BOCO
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: congestive heart failure

variable.name: BOCP
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: initial diagnosis of hypertension

variable.name: BOCQ
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: CVA with permanent neurological deficit

variable.name: BOCR
variable.description: Cardiovascular intercurrent event: CVA without permanent neurological deficit

variable.name: BOCS
variable.description: Intercurrent event: renal insufficiency

variable.name: BOCT
variable.description: Intercurrent event: infusion catheter infection

variable.name: BOCU
variable.description: Intercurrent event: amputation (traumatic)

variable.name: BOCV
variable.description: Intercurrent event: amputation (surgical)

variable.name: BOCW
variable.description: Intercurrent event: accident not requiring hospitalization

variable.name: BOCX
variable.description: Intercurrent event: accident requiring hospitalization

variable.name: BOCY
variable.description: Intercurrent event: overnight hospitalization

variable.name: BOCZ
variable.description: Intercurrent event: psychiatric illness requiring treatment

variable.name: BOCAA
variable.description: Intercurrent event: other

variable.name: BOCBB
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: pregnancy (completed when diagnosed)

variable.name: BOCCC
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: abortion (spontaneous)

variable.name: BOCDD
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: abortion (induced)

variable.name: BOCFF
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: alive with congenital malformation

variable.name: BOCGG
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: alive without congenital malformation

variable.name: BOCHH
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: neonatal death/congenital malformation

variable.name: BOCII
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: neonatal death/other complications

variable.name: BOCJJ
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: still birth/congenital malformation

variable.name: BOCKK
variable.description: Intercurrent event - pregnancy related: still birth/other complications

variable.name: BOCKKA
variable.description: Response to central notification

variable.name: BOCLL
variable.description: Notification of pre-proliferative (retinopathy) characteristics

variable.name: BOCMM
variable.description: Notification of significant macular edema

variable.name: BOCNN
variable.description: Notification of hypercholesterolemia

variable.name: BOCOO
variable.description: Notification of hypertriglyceridemia

variable.name: BOCPP
variable.description: Notification of neuropsychological deterioration

variable.name: BOC3A
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: death

variable.name: BOC3B
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: neurological insult requiring hospitalization

variable.name: BOC3C
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: myocardial infarct

variable.name: BOC3D
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: stroke

variable.name: BOC3E
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: injury to the patient requiring hospitalization

variable.name: BOC3F
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: injury to another person

variable.name: BOC3G
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: property damage

variable.name: BOC3H
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: traffic violation

variable.name: BOC3I
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: loss of consciousness

variable.name: BOC3J
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: seizure

variable.name: BOC3K
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: suspected seizure

variable.name: BOC3L
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: unusual difficulty in awakening

variable.name: BOC3M
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: irrational behavior

variable.name: BOC3N
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: uncontrollable behavior

variable.name: BOC3O
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: confusion

variable.name: BOC3P
variable.description: Symptoms of hypoglycemia: memory loss

variable.name: BOC3Q
variable.description: Other signs of hypoglycemia (specify)

variable.name: BOD1A
variable.description: Intercurrent event treated at: emergency room

variable.name: BOD1B
variable.description: Intercurrent event treated at: hospital inpatient ward

variable.name: BOD1C
variable.description: Intercurrent event treated at: office visit

variable.name: BOD1D
variable.description: Intercurrent event treated at: long-term care institution

variable.name: BOD1F
variable.description: Intercurrent event treated at: other - specify

variable.name: BOD2
variable.description: DCCT staff treated patient for this event

variable.name: BOD3
variable.description: Medication was prescribed

variable.name: BOD4
variable.description: Surgical operation has been performed

variable.name: BOD5
variable.description: Patient received psychiatric counseling

variable.name: BOD6
variable.description: Other forms of treatment were used for event

variable.name: BOD7BI
variable.description: Treatment is still in progress

variable.name: BOE1
variable.description: Diabetic control has been influenced

variable.name: BOE2
variable.description: Diabetic treatment has been altered

variable.name: BOE2BII
variable.description: Date treatment was altered uncertain

variable.name: BOE2CII
variable.description: Patient not yet returned to usual treatment

variable.name: HOSPTX
variable.description: Hospitalized for glycemic control

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
